---
title: "Methological Guidelines"
---

When conducting research, especially with the purpose of reporting the resulst to SKY, it is necessary to follow a set of methodological guidelines.
The set of methodological guidelines is organized so as to correspond to the set of methods social scientists routinely use:

* Randomized Controlled Trials
* Natural Experiments
    + Difference In Differences
    + Regression Discontinuity Designs
    + Instrumental Variables
    + Kink Designs and Notches
* Observational Methods
* Lab Experiments
* Structural Models
* Qualitative Methods
